alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 3:35PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Campbell and western Crook Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 335 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Biddle to 10 miles north of Gillette Airport to 10 miles southwest of Gillette. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Camplex Event Facility around 350 PM MDT. Lightning Flat and Weston around 355 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Rozet and Oshoto. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 110 and 151. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for northeastern Wyoming.

area.areaDesc: Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook
